name: Chocolate makes you happy: New Year
name_original: Chocolate makes you happy: New Year
description:
Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets, jumpers, teleports, accelerators, reverse gravity, traps, treadmills, Christmas ornaments, snow globes, snowflakes and explosions.
The goal of the player is to keep the cookies on the chocolate bar for some time to pass the level.

In Chocolate makes you happy: New Year:
- 50 levels
- Explosions
- Jumpers
- Teleports
- Sweets
- Accelerators
- Traps
- Changing gravity
- Treadmills
- Christmas ornaments
- Snow globes
- Snowflakes
- Christmas art
